tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"巫毒箭","italic": false}',Lore:['[{"text":"命中时为命中的目标附加 20 秒","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"凋零","underlined":true},"效果。",{"text":"（每 1 秒","color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"受到 1 点伤害，持续伤害类效果均不叠加）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','{"text":"因此，若被满弦命中且未能及时开始静息治疗，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"就一定会缓慢凋亡。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','{"text":"未命中时，在箭矢落地之处散出一片半径 5 米、持续 3.5 秒","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"的毒沼，向其中的生物附加","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"中毒","underlined":true},{"text":"（每 0.5 秒受到","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','{"text":"1 点伤害，但中毒不会致死，会残留一点生命值；","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"持续伤害类效果均不叠加）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"text":"与","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"不祥之兆","underlined":true,"color":"gray"},{"text":"（无法静息","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"治疗）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},"。敌方持续 6 秒，友方持续 1 秒。"]','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"25 秒 (白昼)","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":" / 15 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"3 支","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"9 - 16.5（满弦）+ 20（凋零） 或 12（中毒）","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
